<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <FrameLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:padding="8dp">
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/rvConversations" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:clipToPadding="false" android:paddingBottom="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvEmpty" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:gravity="center" android:text="No conversations" android:visibility="gone"/>
</FrameLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="start" android:padding="4dp">
<!-- Left column reserved for sender name / avatar, reduced width to avoid overlap --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="top|start" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp">
<!-- Sender name for received messages --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvSenderNameReceived" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textColor="#333333" android:textSize="12sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:paddingStart="4dp" android:paddingEnd="4dp" android:visibility="visible" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Bubble column (message) --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/messageBubbleReceived" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:layout_marginEnd="72dp" android:layout_gravity="start" android:background="@drawable/bg_message_received" android:maxWidth="280dp" android:padding="8dp" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvMessageReceived" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textColor="#000000" android:textSize="16sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvTimeReceived" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textColor="#666666" android:textSize="11sp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
